title: Connectcon - Products Of The Future
description: Сan the Metaverse help us build better products for our future?

first.heading: Products Of The Future
first.content:
A virtual festival for entrepreneurs, artists, and innovators to gather together to better understand how to collaborate more effectively around building the products for the future.

  • Into the Metaverse: experts and enthusiasts will discuss how to build projects in the Metaverse
  • Metaverse Mingle: get to know fellow doers and their superpowers in our networking space, connect with investors, and meet innovators
  • Metaverse Gallery: visit our virtual gallery to discover the critical milestones of the Metaverse development.

second.heading: Why you need to register
second.content_1: Our gathering of Metaverse entrepreneurs, leaders and innovators is cutting-edge and unique. These accomplished people define new perspectives and create new models for how we work, learn, entertain, connect and collaborate in the virtual environment.

third.heading: Program
third.content:
• Into the Metaverse: leaders, experts, and enthusiasts share insider knowledge about their Metaverse projects.
  • Metaverse Mingle: get to know fellow doers and their superpowers in our networking space, connect with investors, and meet innovators
  • Metaverse Gallery: hop into our virtual gallery to see the Metaverse exhibition. Discover the history of the Metaverse, find out who’s building it, maybe you will become a part of Metaverse history.

1.name: Antony Tran
1.description: CEO at Foundry Six | Metaverse Gaming | Techstars '20

2.name: Enara Nazarova
2.description: Founder at ARMOAR The Digital Fashion & Art Club | Top 30 Voice in the Metaverse

fifth.heading: ConnectCon Organizers
fifth.content:
ConnectCon is organized by the passionate team behind Connect Club, the new social media in the Metaverse for genuine human connection

Connect.Club connects people who thrive on inspiration, learning, and growing our careers and culture..

rows.1: connect to investors and meet fellow innovators
rows.2: get backstage to network with speakers and influencers
rows.3: open discussions of projects you might have been working on
rows.4: first-hand insights into the development of the Metaverse

rows.1: a unique virtual event site in ConnectClub’s part of the Metaverse
rows.2: backstage networking with guests and influencers
rows.4: enjoy the full support of our conference team

rows.2: network with guests, influencers, and experts
rows.3: meet and build your community with like-minded people
